item.title: The Marshall Project Wins EPPY Award for Best Collaborative Investigative/Enterprise Reporting
item.description: The Marshall Project, St. Louis Public Radio and APM Reports were recognized for their investigation into homicide clearance rates in St. Louis.

item.title: Is The Age of Progressive Prosecutors Over?
item.description: Some believe progressive prosecutors have had their moment, but others argue that view misinterprets what’s happening across the country.

item.title: A Prison Rape Survivor Demands Smart, Safe and Humane Transfers
item.description: “I know how a relocation can exacerbate violence,” writes Johanna Mills. “Even when the place you’re leaving is so toxic that you can’t stay there.”

item.title: Cuyahoga County Jail Will Now Do More Than Show People the Door
item.description: Reentry changes come in response to The Marshall Project - Cleveland investigation that showed people leaving jail got little help to avoid returning.

item.title: How We Reported on Rhetoric About Immigrants in the 2024 Election
item.description: The Marshall Project identified themes in over 12,000 immigration-related campaign statements and fact-checked 13 of Trump’s most repeated claims.
